entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 1:39 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C

Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
